title: How Minimum Works
subtitle: Renting has never been easier. Get started in three simple steps.

0.title: Browse & Select
0.description: Explore our curated collection of premium equipment. Filter by category, price, or availability to find exactly what you need.

1.title: Choose Your Terms
1.description: Select your rental duration - from a single day to months. Flexible scheduling that fits your timeline and budget.

2.title: Receive & Enjoy
2.description: Sign the agreement, receive your package, and enjoy your rental. After the rental period, simply return it to the owner.
